# Objective
Test performance of different FFT sizes.

```{python}
import numpy as np
import matplotlib.pyplot as plt
from numpy.fft import fft2, ifft2

n = 256
H0 = np.random.rand(n, n) + 1j*np.random.rand(n, n)
Ht = H0*np.exp(1j*2*np.pi*0.1)
height = np.real(ifft2(Ht))

plt.imshow(height, cmap='viridis')
plt.title("Ocean Heightfield")
plt.show()
